verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more נֶ֤גַע <S%H5061><s%> plague אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one אָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> Yet will I bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> [more] upon Pharaoh וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> and upon Egypt אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> afterwards כֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יְשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> he will let you go אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> here כְּשַׁ֨לְּח֔וֹ <S%H7971><s%> hence when he shall let [you] go כָּלָ֕ה <S%H3617><s%> hence altogether גָּרֵ֛שׁ <S%H1644><s%> he shall surely יְגָרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1644><s%> thrust you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> here

דַּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> Speak נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> now in the ears הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְיִשְׁאֲל֞וּ <S%H7592><s%> borrow אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> and let every man מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> of his neighbour וְאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> and every woman מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> רְעוּתָ֔הּ <S%H7468><s%> of her neighbour כְּלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> jewels כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> and jewels זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> of gold

וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> gave יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֵ֥ן <S%H2580><s%> favour הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian גַּ֣ם ׀ <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Moreover the man מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses גָּד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> [was] very בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of the Egyptians בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight עַבְדֵֽי־ <S%H5650><s%> servants פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh's וּבְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> and in the sight הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כַּחֲצֹ֣ת <S%H2676><s%> mid הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יוֹצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> will I go out בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וּמֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> shall die כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּכוֹר֮ <S%H1060><s%> And all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבְּכ֤וֹר <S%H1060><s%> from the firstborn פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that sitteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> upon his throne עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> even בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> even unto the firstborn הַשִּׁפְחָ֔ה <S%H8198><s%> of the maidservant אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> that [is] behind הָרֵחָ֑יִם <S%H7347><s%> the mill וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> and all the firstborn בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> of beasts

וְהָֽיְתָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> And there shall be צְעָקָ֥ה <S%H6818><s%> cry גְדֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> a great בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> before כָּמֹ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3644><s%> such לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> such as there was none נִהְיָ֔תָה <S%H1961><s%> been וְכָמֹ֖הוּ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> like it nor תֹסִֽף׃ <S%H3254><s%> shall be like it any more

וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> any בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> But against any of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יֶֽחֱרַץ־ <S%H2782><s%> move כֶּ֙לֶב֙ <S%H3611><s%> shall not a dog לְשֹׁנ֔וֹ <S%H3956><s%> his tongue לְמֵאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> or בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> or beast לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> that תֵּֽדְע֔וּן <S%H3045><s%> that ye may know אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> how יַפְלֶ֣ה <S%H6395><s%> doth put a difference יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> how that the LORD בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> between the Egyptians וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel

וְיָרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> shall come down כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֲבָדֶיךָ֩ <S%H5650><s%> And all these thy servants אֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> to me וְהִשְׁתַּֽחֲוּוּ־ <S%H7812><s%> unto me and bow down לִ֣י לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> themselves unto me saying צֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> Get thee out אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּרַגְלֶ֔יךָ <S%H7272><s%> that follow וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> thee and after כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אֵצֵ֑א <S%H3318><s%> that I will go out וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> And he went out מֵֽעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> from פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh בָּחֳרִי־ <S%H2750><s%> in a great אָֽף׃ <S%H639><s%> anger ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> shall not hearken אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> so רְב֥וֹת <S%H7235><s%> may be multiplied מוֹפְתַ֖י <S%H4159><s%> unto you that my wonders בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וּמֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron עָשׂ֛וּ <S%H6213><s%> did אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמֹּפְתִ֥ים <S%H4159><s%> all these wonders הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before פַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וַיְחַזֵּ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> hardened יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שִׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> so that he would not let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> of his land פ
